paper_abstract: More exact state estimation can be obtained by multisensor system. But measurement noises from different sensors are generally correlated when multisensor system applied in state monitoring. By solving the maximum eigenvalue of measurement covariances matrix, a Pei-Radman fusion estimation algorithm is developed for the practical state monitoring. The numerical example shows that the fusion method here is very simple and can obtain an optimal estimation in this special multisensor fusion system.
paper_title: Pei-Radman fusion estimation algorithm for multisensor system applied in state monitoring
